name: Phosphor 1.16.1 Backport
description: Phosphor is an optimization mod for Minecraft which improves the performance of the lighting engine, resulting in significantly reduced world generation times and improved server tick rates. This is an unofficial backport of JellySquid and PhiPro's original mod. You can help support JellySquid on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/jellysquid
